talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>{ui_string:1200001}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200002}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200003}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200004}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200005}</html>
<html>{ui_string:257}</html>

${user_nick}$
It's not that. It's those stupid brigands there...
I just hope they don't do something dumb with the books….

$Grele$
What is this? A clue, perhaps?

${user_nick}$
Huh? Grele?

$Lapis$
………….

$Young Child$
………….

$Rhadames Guard$
…………….

$Grele$
……………..

$Shrub$
………………………….

$Bandit Grunt$
………………………….

$Princess Sylvania$
………………………...

$Grele$
I'm back from Vulcan Swamp. All I found were some refugees who had lost their way.
None of them knew anything about the Cup of Healing or the ancient book. Did you find anything, {user_nick}?

${user_nick}$
Fortunately, I found someone from the archive, but they lost the ancient book copy in the Red Waste.
So I was planning on going to the Red Waste...

$Grele$
Then allow me to join you. I already led the refugees to safety.
If you're going to the Red Waste, I want to come too.

${user_nick}$
All right. What about Geraint? Is he back yet?

$Princess Sylvania$
We don't have time to wait for stragglers. We'll be coming back here anyway, so let's just get it over with.

$Princess Sylvania$
You said your name was Grele, right? The more people, the better. I heard there are bandits out there. Shall we go together?
※ Go to the Red Waste and find the copy of the Ancient Book.

$Grele${sound:npc_Grele_qu9923_sp_01.ogg}
How do you plan to find the ancient book? The waste is vast...

${user_nick}$
Well… I guess we'll just have to look around here and there?

$Princess Sylvania$
Won't that take too long? I heard this is where the bandits frequent.
Why don't we just raid the bandits and take everything they have?
Besides, it's not like they came by their possessions honestly.

${user_nick}$
But we can't be sure they picked up the book.
They might have just tossed it aside if they didn't think it had value.

$Grele$
What a mess… For now, it seems the best we can do is just look around, though it'll take a while.

$???$
Sniff… Sniff...

${user_nick}$
Huh? Hang on, do you hear that?

$Princess Sylvania$
Hear what?

${user_nick}$
It sounds like someone crying…

$Grele$
I think it's coming from behind that tree over there!

$???$
Sniff… Sniff...

$Young Child$
Mommy… Mommy… Sniff… Where are you…?

$Princess Sylvania$
Hey, it's a child! What are you doing here? Are you okay?

$Young Child$
Sniff… Princess? Are you the princess?

$Princess Sylvania$
Yes, I am. But why are you here?

$Young Child$
Sniff... Mommy and I… were escaping Aergal…
But we got lost… Mommy wasn't eaten by the red fire, was she?

${user_nick}$
The red fire?

$Young Child$
(Nods.) I was selling flowers with Mommy in the square, sniff…
Then the ceiling suddenly collapsed… sniff. And then…
Red fire suddenly fell from the ceiling and hurt people…

$Young Child$
Sniff, Mommy and I ran away... But what if the red fire chased us…?

$Princess Sylvania$
Oh my, it's all right! No fire is coming to get you.
Don't worry, your mother is probably in Rhadames waiting for you. I'll bring you to her.

$Grele$
Red fire… {user_nick} No way…

${user_nick}$
It couldn't be… Why would Rubinart do such a thing?
The other refugees didn't mention anything about fire. It must have happened due to an accident…

${user_nick}$
Anyway, should we bring the child to Rhadames first? It's too dangerous here…

$Bandit Grunt$
Stop right there! Gimme all yer belongins!! If ye don't I'll save yer life!!

$Senior Bandit$
Idiot!! You mean, if ye don't I'll take yer life!!!

${user_nick}$
(Is this some kind of bandit comedy act?)
I'll take care of this. Princess, could you take the child and step back a safe distance?

$Princess Sylvania$
No, we should seize them and ask them about the ancient book.

${user_nick}$
All right. In that case… (Grabs weapon.)

$????$
Wait!!!!!

$Lapis$
I will take care of them. You should leave this place.

$Bandit Grunt$
Huh? Sub-captain Lapis? Are you going to take care of this?! You're so amazing!!

$Senior Bandit$
They know the sub-captain? Come on, let's get out of here. (Leaves with the Bandit Grunt.)

${user_nick}$
(Did they say "sub-captain?") Lapis?

$Lapis${sound:npc_Lapis_qu9923_sp_01.ogg}
My old friend. It has been a long time.

${user_nick}$
What in heaven's name are you doing here?

$Lapis$
I thought joining the Red Waste bandits would be a good way to hide, and before I knew it I became the sub-captain.
It would be a major miscalculation on your part if you thought I needed anyone’s help.

${user_nick}$
(Princess Sylvania seems to have something to say.)

$Princess Sylvania$
Is this a joke? Do you know each other? Those bandits called him the sub-captain.

${user_nick}$
Yes, we've helped each other out in the past. He went into hiding here...
But I guess he somehow rose to be their sub-captain.

$Princess Sylvania$
Really? Then we can get help from this guy.
If he's connected with the bandits, he might know something about the box with the ancient book.

$Grele$
I do think it would be better to ask than to try to search this entire area.
He might know something…

${user_nick}$
All right. (Let's ask Lapis about the ancient book box.)

${user_nick}$
Lapis, we're looking for a box. Can you help us?

${user_nick}$
It's a small, red box... It looks something like this.
(Describes the box that the archivist Tom spoke of.)
A refugee of Aergal was carrying the box, but lost it during a bandit raid.

$Lapis$
Box? Hmm. I did notice the refugees moving some goods. Among them was a red box that big.

$Lapis${sound:npc_Lapis_qu9923_sp_02.ogg}
But... I'm sorry, I would have kept it safe if I knew you were looking for it.

$Lapis${sound:npc_Lapis_qu9923_sp_03.ogg}
There was a box raided from the refugees that day. It was a red box
that matches the size you mentioned. But... (Scratching his head with a pained expression.)
Of all things, there was a fire in the warehouse that day.

$Lapis$
So the stuff in the warehouse burned down... We weren't able to save much.
The box you mentioned must have been destroyed.

${user_nick}$
No way… Th-then the books inside...?!

$Lapis$
Books? Were there books in the box? I think the guy who picked up the box would know...
But he had an upset stomach the day before, and fell sick...
Anyway, it seems like there's a good chance it was in the warehouse.

${user_nick}$
Then…… How did the fire start?!

$Lapis${sound:npc_Lapis_qu9923_sp_04.ogg}
I don't know the exact reason… Suddenly there was just a fire.
Come to think of it, I saw the Mercenary Vandar and a blue-haired Child here before the fire started.

${user_nick}$
Vandar and a Child?! (Blue-haired… Could it be… Hiver?!)

${user_nick}$
This is bad! Something might have happened in Rhadames!
(Is Hwaran up to something? Could Hwaran have teamed up with Hiver to attack Rhadames? Norfe said he has a plan, but…)

$Lapis${sound:npc_Lapis_qu9923_sp_05.ogg}
What is the matter? That can't be true. I don't like Mercenary Vandar, but he's not an evil man.

${user_nick}$
I don't know about that. He stole something from me before!

$Lapis$
Is it possible there was a misunderstanding?
He wouldn't have done that for no reason. Maybe he had good cause?

${user_nick}$
(Norfe also said he must have done it for a reason, but…)
Anyway, could you tell me what the two of them were doing here?

$Lapis$
Vandar opened a box and spoke into some kind of gem, then the blue-haired Child appeared.
Then he produced a letter and the two conversed for a time.

$Lapis${sound:npc_Lapis_qu9923_sp_06.ogg}
They spoke of Rhadames. Actually, I wasn't aware there were any Childs who knew about Rhadames,

${user_nick}$
(It really was Hiver!!) Did you hear what they said about Rhadames?!

$Lapis$
I didn't hear what they said precisely, but there was mention of dealing with something.
I also heard Norfe and Grele's names.

${user_nick}$
(It seems she hasn't given up the idea of killing Grele... And now she's after Norfe, too!)

$Lapis$
Hmm… I also saw the two meet up again in Vulcan Swamp.

${user_nick}$
In Vulcan Swamp??

$Lapis${sound:npc_Lapis_qu9923_sp_07.ogg}
Yes, but it wasn't a long meeting. The dark blue-haired Child gave Vandar an order.
She said she was done laying the groundwork, so all he had to do was tell the others what to do. I didn't hear what the order was.

${user_nick}$
An order...? No way!
(Does this mean Rhadames is in danger? Plus there's the fact they mentioned both Norfe and Grele…!)

$Rhadames Guard$
Everyone evacuate!

${user_nick}$
(What is all this commotion? I don't see Norfe anywhere. Where is he?)

${user_nick}$
What's going on!?
<html>$Quest Complete$</html>

${user_nick}$
I have a bad feeling about this. We better go back to Rhadames before something happens.

※ Return to Rhadames.

journal.title: To Find the Ancient Book
journal.contents:
You found out the location of the Ancient Book transcript, and it turns out it was dropped in the Red Waste, of all places. Speak with Princess Sylvania about what to do next.

Rhadames - Princess Sylvania
journal.destination: Speak with Princess Sylvania about the Ancient Book

journal.title: Searching the Wasteland
journal.contents:
The archivist says he dropped the box containing the Ancient Book transcript somewhere in the Red Waste. Go search for the box in the Red Waste.

Rhadames (Anti-Goddess Faction Secret Passage) - Red Waste (Grele)
journal.destination: (Solo) Talk to Grele in the Red Waste
journal.todo_msg: Find the Ancient Book in the Red Waste.

journal.title: Grey Earth
journal.contents:
While searching through the Red Waste, you heard a sound. Isn't that someone crying? Take a closer look.

Rhadames (Anti-Goddess Faction Secret Passage) - Red Waste (Young Child)
journal.destination: (Solo) Check the place where you hear crying
journal.todo_msg: Check the place where you hear crying.

journal.title: Silent Harbinger
journal.contents:
Bandits suddenly attacked while you were soothing the child! But... Something's wrong with them. Listen to what they say.

Rhadames (Anti-Goddess Faction Secret Passage) - Red Waste (Bandit Grunt)

journal.title: A Reunion
journal.contents:
You were about to put the run to the bandits when Lapis suddenly appeared. Does he know those bandits? You should talk to Lapis and find out.

Rhadames (Anti-Goddess Faction Secret Passage) - Red Waste (Lapis)
journal.todo_msg: Check out the person who intervened.

journal.title: Shortening Fuse
journal.contents:
The bandits referred to Lapis as their sub-captain. It seems he's pretty high up the chain of command… Anyway, Princess Sylvania seems to have something to say. Talk to her.

Rhadames (Anti-Goddess Faction Secret Passage) - Red Waste (Princess Sylvania)
journal.todo_msg: Princess Sylvania seems to have something to say.

journal.title: Burning Embers
journal.contents:
As the princess said, Lapis might know something. Speak with Lapis and try to learn something about the Ancient Book.

Rhadames (Anti-Goddess Faction Secret Passage) - Red Waste (Lapis)
journal.destination: (Solo) Speak with Lapis about the box
journal.todo_msg: Ask Lapis about the Ancient Book.

journal.title: Approaching Danger
journal.contents:
According to Lapis, Hiver is targeting Rhadames! You better tell Norfe about this, and quickly. Return to Rhadames and find Norfe!

Rhadames - Rhadames Guard
journal.destination: (Solo) Talk to the Guard in Rhadames
